predicate.note: Frames file for 'enliven' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to make lively or spirited, animate

example.name: gerund
example.text: He distinguished the two cases : In Salinger , Judge Leval noted [0] [*T*-1] , the quotations were for the purpose of [*] enlivening the biography rather than of [*] proving points about the subject .
